value:
$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|I am a Brave Hero! One of the chosen
few, elected by forces that the mortal
mind dare not try and comprehend!$k$pYou would call upon me? I am ready!
I shall charge forth, the cry echoing
in my throat! RADIANT DAAAAAAA—$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|Um, hey.$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Hello! Would you mind coming back
later? I am contemplating a new,
powerful cry to shock our foes!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|Right.$k$p"Brave Hero" may be a bit hard to
swallow, but truth be told, I see a lot
of potential in this opportunity.$k$pThis is a good chance to experience
things I wouldn't if I were fighting
with the Deliverance.$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Yes! You have pierced the veil, cast
off your chains, and brushed away
the cobwebs! You are free to fly!$k$pMy brother, dark wanderer...well
met! It must be our fated blood—a
destiny a millennium in the making!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|Could you...stop? I'm not a kid, and
neither are you. Talking to you is
excruciatingly embarrassing.$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Wha-what?!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Hnnngh... My roaring blood, quiet!
Quiet, I beg thee! Still thy power...
the time is not yet ripe!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|OK. That means we're retreating,
right? Yes, that's what that means.$k$p$Sbs150|
